languages.text: {n}Ваши руки двигаются синхронно, ткут причудливую мелодию. Ее невозможно предугадать, лишь следовать за движениями Соломона — но он ведет вас уверенно, а вы откликаетесь со сноровкой. Вы замечаете, что ваши пальцы сплелись, лишь когда изменяется ритм музыки.{/n}

{n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши руки двигаются синхронно, ткут причудливую мелодию. Ее невозможно предугадать, лишь следовать за движениями Соломона — но он ведет вас уверенно, а вы откликаетесь со сноровкой. Вы замечаете, что ваши пальцы сплелись, лишь когда изменяется ритм музыки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

{n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの手はソロモーンの手と息を合わせて動き、幻想的な旋律を紡いでいく。次にどんな音が続くのかを予測できず、ただソロモーンの動きに従うしかない。だが彼は確実にあなたをリードし、あなたも器用に応じた。音楽のリズムが変わったそのときになって初めて、二人の指が絡み合っていることに気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの手はソロモーンの手と息を合わせて動き、幻想的な旋律を紡いでいく。次にどんな音が続くのかを予測できず、ただソロモーンの動きに従うしかない。だが彼は確実にあなたをリードし、あなたも器用に応じた。音楽のリズムが変わったそのときになって初めて、二人の指が絡み合っていることに気づいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eure Hände bewegen sich synchron und weben eine fantasievolle Melodie. Du kannst sie nicht vorhersagen und folgst nur Solomornes Bewegungen – aber er führt dich sicher, und du reagierst geschickt. Du bemerkst lediglich, dass eure Finger sich ineinander verschränkt haben, als der Rhythmus der Musik wechselt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eure Hände bewegen sich synchron und weben eine fantasievolle Melodie. Du kannst sie nicht vorhersagen und folgst nur Solomornes Bewegungen – aber er führt dich sicher, und du reagierst geschickt. Du bemerkst lediglich, dass eure Finger sich ineinander verschränkt haben, als der Rhythmus der Musik wechselt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos mains se déplacent à l'unisson sur le clavier, produisant une mélodie élaborée. Incapable de prédire les notes suivantes, vous vous laissez guider par les mouvements de Solomorne, qui mène la danse avec assurance tandis que vous répondez à ses gestes avec dextérité. Ce n'est que lorsque le rythme de la musique change que vous remarquez que vos doigts se sont entremêlés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos mains se déplacent à l'unisson sur le clavier, produisant une mélodie élaborée. Incapable de prédire les notes suivantes, vous vous laissez guider par les mouvements de Solomorne, qui mène la danse avec assurance tandis que vous répondez à ses gestes avec dextérité. Ce n'est que lorsque le rythme de la musique change que vous remarquez que vos doigts se sont entremêlés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vuestras manos se mueven al unísono para interpretar una sofisticada melodía. Al ser incapaz de predecirla, te limitas a seguir los movimientos de Solomorne; el Arbitrator te guía con firmeza y tú respondes con soltura. No te das cuenta de que tenéis los dedos entrelazados hasta que el ritmo de la música varía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vuestras manos se mueven al unísono para interpretar una sofisticada melodía. Al ser incapaz de predecirla, te limitas a seguir los movimientos de Solomorne; el Arbitrator te guía con firmeza y tú respondes con soltura. No te das cuenta de que tenéis los dedos entrelazados hasta que el ritmo de la música varía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你们两人的双手同步移动着，编织出了梦幻般的旋律。你不知道接下来要弹奏的音符是哪些，便只能跟着索罗蒙的动作。索罗蒙引导着你，而你的反应也相当敏锐。乐章的节奏改变时你才意识到，你们两人的手指早已缠绕在一起了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你们两人的双手同步移动着，编织出了梦幻般的旋律。你不知道接下来要弹奏的音符是哪些，便只能跟着索罗蒙的动作。索罗蒙引导着你，而你的反应也相当敏锐。乐章的节奏改变时你才意识到，你们两人的手指早已缠绕在一起了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elleriniz ahenkle hareket ediyor, hoş bir melodi çalıyor. Solomorne yönlendirirken sen de ne geleceğini bilmeden ustaca takip ediyorsun. Ritim değiştiğinde parmaklarınızın birbirine kenetlendiğini fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hands move in sync, weaving a fanciful melody. You cannot predict it, only follow Solomorne's movements — but he leads you assuredly, and you respond deftly. You only notice that your fingers have become intertwined when the rhythm of the music changes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elleriniz ahenkle hareket eder, hoş bir melodi çalar. Solomorne yönlendirir, sen ne geleceğini bilmeden ustaca takip edersin. Ritim değiştiğinde parmaklarınızın birbirine kenetlendiğini fark edersin.{/n}
